data.title: Sonesta St. George Hotel
data.meta_description: Located less than a mile from Luxor Temple, Sonesta St. George Hotel - Luxor is a 5* hotel with majestic views of the Nile. Discover Egypt with Sonesta.
data.text:
Sports and Fitness

Outdoor heated swimming pool with separate children's section

Aerobic classes

Weekly Activities Program

Fully-equipped Health and Fitness Center offering free weights, exercise and strength-training machines, massage, sauna, steam room and jacuzzi

Shopping

The hotel is located in the center of Luxor's shopping district

A luxury shopping arcade on the lobby level of the hotel offers a wide selection of items from Egyptian handicrafts to gold and diamond jewelry

Children's Activities

Organized games, activities, trips and competitions

Points of Interest

The Valley of the Kings with the tomb of Tutankhamun, and the burial chamber of the sons of King Ramses II

Valley of the Queens including the Tomb of Nefertari

Colossi of Memnon

Luxor Temple

Luxor Museum

Karnak Temple with a Sound and Light Show

Facilities and Services

Swimming Pool

Poolside Bar Offering Snacks and Drinks (Open 8:30 AM-6:00 PM)

24-hour Room Service

On-Site Bank

Laundry and Valet Service

Message Service

Babysitting

On-Site Travel Agency

Money Exchange and ATM Machines

Massage Service

Hairdresser

Lobby Area (there is aNo Smoking seating area at the lobby in front of elevators)

Fully Equipped Event Space - features panoramic views of the Nile and accommodates up to 600 guests

Guests Free Wi-Fi Service in Lobby and Swimming Pool Area

For more information, please email us at reservation@sonestaluxor.com.

Spa & Health Club

Guests have access to our full-service health club, located on the lower level, offering a wide variety of weights and machines for use during your stay. Or enjoy a message with total relaxation.

Policies

To help ensure that all guests can to enjoy a safe and healthy vacation, they are required to follow our policy throughout their stay.

At Sonesta, we are passionate about food and we love to create culinary experiences for you. We value and encourage our culinary staff’s creativity, and the results are overwhelming. We are dedicated to the most intricate details—the finest ingredients, the freshest, most beautiful products and most elegant of dining accessories. Every meal is a masterpiece. And while each event, and each meal, is customized to meet your needs, our cuisine shares one defining element. At Sonesta, Food is Art.

For more information, please contact reservation@sonestaluxor.com

Miyako

Miyako presents Japanese cuisine. The restaurant’s Japanese design creates an elegant dining atmosphere; with private dining room and a Tatami room for intimate gatherings, while the open seating area offers Teppan Yaki tables for a larger group of 10. Authentic Japanese and Asian fare is freshly prepared using genuine Japanese ingredients.

Miyako Menu

Nobles Lounge

An authentic english lounge with premier views of the Nile from large picture windows situated on the 1st floor mezzanine level where an abundance of natural daylight enhances the black American walnut wood. The Nobles lounge offers a wide range of assorted cocktails, an excellent selection of wines and nightly DJ performances that add to the cozy ambience.

Lobby Area

There is a No Smoking seating area at the lobby in- front of elevators.

Lotus café

Enjoy your early morning coffee, afternoon tea with cake, or stop by for a pre-dinner aperitif at our Lotus café. Lotus is located in the lobby and open 24 hours for our guests to enjoy an extensive choice of cocktails, fresh pastries and refreshing beverages.for a larger group of 10. Authentic Japanese and Asian fare is freshly prepared using genuine Japanese ingredients.

Serapis

The main dining room features natural light and views of the Nile River and pool, serving buffet breakfast, lunch and theme dinners featuring Continental, International, Japanese and Egyptian cuisine.

Jeb’s Pool & Swim-up Bar

Overlooking the main pool and the Nile River is a must for guests ready to fall into the Luxor vibe. The inviting swim-up bar lies within the Jeb’s pool offering a selection of salads, wraps and light snacks, smoothies, shakes, cocktails and a wide selection of beverages.

Beban

Beban is our signature restaurant with spectacular views of the Nile and the hotel swimming pool from large panoramic windows located on the first floor. Serving à la carte Italian specialties and a wide range of beverages in an intimate setting.

Beban Menu

Nile Pontoon

Enjoy a laid-back oriental cafe with breathtaking sunset views of the Nile River, serving Shisha with a wide selection of flavored tobacco as well as Oriental teas and coffees.

Location: overlooking the Nile River

Floating deck (approximately 250 pax)

A special place for lunches, dinners or cocktail parties

Daily sunset music concert

Whether you’re planning a board of directors meeting, a theatre style seminar or special event, the Sonesta St. George Hotel Luxor is perfectly situated to accommodate all of your needs. Our meeting and function rooms are large enough for impressive receptions, yet small enough for elegant, attentive service.

Four flexible function rooms with state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment ensure that space is never an issue. A personal conference service manager and innovative catering team will custom design your meeting or banquet from the overall theme to the smallest detail.

A Business Center provides all the corporate amenities, including secretaries and associated services required by conference organizers, delegates and in-house guests.

Outdoor Events

The Sonesta St. George Hotel Luxor is well recognized for creating successful, well designed and innovative indoor and outdoor corporate and social events.

Imagine your gathering amidst the ancient antiquities of Egypt. Whether you are hosting 5 or 1,500 guests, why not expect the extraordinary? Our creative catering team is experienced in organizing unforgettable themed events at spectacular historic sites in Luxor from Felucca breakfast buffet to a la carte plated sit-down dinners in Karnak temple.
